title: HELP!
body: The problem of the disconnect is fixed but i still cannot connect to chat,help please

replies.body: Are you still having issues connecting to the chat servers or has this been resolved for you now?

Hello,
I believe there was some issue yesterday on EUNE. You can keep an eye on server status pages when something abnormal happens:
https://status.leagueoflegends.com/#eune
https://twitter.com/status_lol
